paper_abstract: This letter presents new delayed perturbation bounds (DPBs) for stabilizing receding horizon H-infinity control (RHHC). The linear matrix inequality (LMI) approach to determination of DPBs for the RHHC is proposed. We show through a numerical example that the RHHC can guarantee an H-infinity norm bound for a larger class of systems with delayed perturbations than conventional infinite horizon H-infinity control (IHHC).
paper_title: An LMI approach to computing delayed perturbation bounds for stabilizing receding horizon H-infinity controls
